subject: Refactor: use text-ui-text instead of dark:text-zinc-100
body:
Standardized text color handling across input fields to use semantic
text-ui-text class which auto-switches via CSS variables, instead of
explicit dark:text-zinc-100 overrides.

Files updated:
- MediaTab.jsx (2 inputs)
- ContentTab.jsx (1 textarea)
- StyleTab.jsx (2 selects)
- TemplatesTab.jsx (1 input)
